name: eight20results/e20r-mailchimp-for-membership-plugins
description: Use MailChimp Interest Groups and Merge Fields when adding members to your MailChimp.com list(s) when they purchase, sign up, or register to get access your site/products. Segment users with Merge Tags and/or MailChimp Interest Groups. Include custom user meta data in the merge tags/merge fields. Supports Paid Memberships Pro and WooCommerce
